name: Close your eyes (Trijam#148)
description:
hey there , this is my first time to join this 3hr jam!

i wish i have time to draw a background and add the block texture  ;_;

3h to finish this work (0.5h for all art , 2h for coding , 0.5 for design level)
a girl has a cool inconvenient super powers that she can see the invisible danger by close her eyes , and she will need to open it after 5 second because she will lost the sense of direction.

control:

Z to use Inconvenient super powers
X to jump 

if you dead here will leave a blood at your dead place

you can use this to detect danger

*btw here is no voice
